titles.title: Expressing the need to raise awareness and promote capacity building to strategically address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean.
Expressing the need to raise awareness and promote capacity building to strategically address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

bill.summary:
Urges development of a comprehensive, scientifically based, region-wide strategy, including local management plans and international partnerships, to address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean.
Encourages raising public awareness about the lionfish invasion across the United States and its territories through outreach and education.
